text:
mod_proxy document has the following sample; ProxyPass /special-area http://special.example.com/ smax=5 max=10 I think this is not a good sample, because the other part of the document says as follows,

If the first argument ends with a trailing /, the second argument should also end with a trailing / and vice versa. Otherwise the resulting requests to the backend may miss some needed slashes and do not deliver the expected results.

The sample should be ProxyPass /special-area http://special.example.com smax=5 max=10 or ProxyPass /special-area/ http://special.example.com/ smax=5 max=10
creator: inoue@ariel-networks.com
